description: Get a URL to upload content to a knowledge base. To upload content, first make a PUT request to the returned URL with your file, making sure to include the required headers. Then use CreateContent to finalize the content creation process or UpdateContent to modify an existing resource. You can only upload content to a knowledge base of type CUSTOM.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of content to upload.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: headersToInclude
nested_items.description: The headers to include in the upload.

nested_items.name: urlExpiry
nested_items.description: The expiration time of the URL as an epoch timestamp.
